review: Not a bad product but if you're going to do a lot of streaming I'd go with the Fire TV.  I have both and more than anything the remote with the Fire TV is what wins me over.
author: Michael

review: Love our Chromecast. We've had this for over a year now and love how it simplifies watching Hulu, Netflix, etc. Just wish we could get Amazon Prime to work with it.
author: ~A~

review: Performs exactly as described ...super easy to use. Great image quality.

review: My new best friend easy set up love your product.
author: Matthew F.

review: This is wonderful! I had a little trouble setting it up at first but Google Customer Support is great and can help you through it!

review: It has been a good purchase but sometimes switching from one program to another takes a few seconds or it just freezes. Overall, I'm pretty happy with this little thing.
